name: HDFC Bank Credit Cards
offer_snippet: Credit Card Referral Program - Refer and Earn | HDFC Bank — Refer HDFC Bank Credit Cards and earn vouchers worth ₹250 for each successful referral. Share with friends and enjoy rewards with HDFC's Credit Card Referral Pr
offers: OFFERS Offers, Discounts Smartbuy Compare & Fly Compare & Shop Deals & Offers SmartBuy Hotels Dining Offers OFFERS FOR YOU
Smartbuy Compare & Fly Compare & Shop Deals & Offers SmartBuy Hotels Dining Offers
Smartbuy Compare & Fly Compare & Shop Deals & Offers SmartBuy Hotels Dining Offers OFFERS FOR YOU
Reward for Both: After one financial transaction of the referred Credit Card, both the referrer, i.e., you and the referee receive a ₹250 voucher each.
The referrer and referee will be rewarded only if the referee's Credit Card application is submitted after the referrer has entered the referee’s name and mobile number on the referral portal.
This offer is not applicable to physical Credit Card applications.
HDFC Bank employees are not eligible for the referral voucher, and the referrer and referee will not be rewarded if the referee already holds an HDFC Bank Credit Card.

"Wow! Loving the Kotak811 zero balance account. They offer free & fast fund transfer option as well"
Looking for a hassle-free way to save and manage your money? Open Kotak811 zero balance savings account gives you the flexibility to bank on your terms. Here are a host of benefits you can enjoy:
1. Experience zero balance freedom: Save at your pace with no minimum balance requirement—no penalties, just convenience.
